segments.text: so , which sport do you prefer---basketball or baseball ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: to be honest , I don't really care for either one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought everyone liked basketball . Why don't you like it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I used to play basketball when I was little , and I never scored a goal . Every time I watch a basketball game , I think about how horrible I was at it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how about you ? What's your favorite sport of all time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: my absolute favorite is ice hockey .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: have you ever seen a live game ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sure , many times . It's an exciting game for spectators to watch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've never really understood the game .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's not that difficult . If you want to watch a game with me , I can explain the rules and the tactics while we're watching .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: thanks , that'd be nice . When's the next ice hockey game on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: not for a while , but we could watch an old one on the internet so I can explain the game to you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: let's watch the Canadian team . They have a good manager and a great coach .
segments.speaker: S1
